#!/bin/bash -ex
yum install git -y
sudo -u ec2-user bash -c 'cd /home/ec2-user; git clone https://github.com/craigwongva/lime.git > /tmp/u01 2>&1 '
sudo -u ec2-user bash -c 'cd /home/ec2-user/lime; ./userdata-jenkins > /tmp/u03d 2>&1'
sudo -u ec2-user bash -c 'cd /home/ec2-user/lime; ./userdata-nexus-only > /tmp/u04d 2>&1'
sudo -u ec2-user bash -c 'cd /home/ec2-user/lime; ./userdata-grails-green > /tmp/u05d 2>&1'
sudo -u ec2-user bash -c 'cd /home/ec2-user/lime; ./userdata-sonar > /tmp/u06d 2>&1'
